thread.title: Toronto Secures First Playoff Spot
thread.title_full: Toronto Secures First Playoff Spot - The New York Times

author: The Associated Press
title: Toronto Secures First Playoff Spot
text:
TORONTO â€” Sebastian Giovinco scored his 22nd goal of the season, and Toronto F.C. beat the Red Bulls, 2-1, on Tuesday night to clinch its first playoff appearance.
Giovinco sent a charge through the crowd of 18,143 when he deked several Red Bulls defenders before firing a shot into the right side of the net in the 78th minute. Giovinco flew back to Canada hours after playing for Italy in a qualifying match for the 2016 European Championship.
It was the fourth straight win for Toronto F.C. (15-13-4), which is headed to the playoffs for the first time since it joined M.L.S. in 2006.
Herculez Gomez gave Toronto a 1-0 lead in the 51st minute.
Shaun Wright-Phillips scored for the Red Bulls (16-10-6) in the 86th minute. The Red Bulls are five points ahead of Toronto F.C. for first place in the Eastern Conference with two games remaining on their regular-season schedule.
